snippet: After years of struggle, Heather Hardy is a rising force in professional boxing and has become a source of pride in Gerritsen Beach, a tightknit neighborhood devastated by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Heather Hardy is a rising force in professional boxing and has become a source of pride in Gerritsen Beach, tightknit Brooklyn neighborhood where her family has deep roots.
lead_paragraph: After years of struggle, Heather Hardy is a rising force in professional boxing and has become a source of pride in Gerritsen Beach, a tightknit neighborhood devastated by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: Brooklyn Boxer Rises, but Her Feet Stay on the Ground
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Boxer Rises, but Her Feet Stay on the Ground
